Author: milkeyedmenders
Text: it’s a mental illness on its own. however in my experience most people with an ed also fit the criteria for and/or are diagnosed with other mental illnesses as well (commonly anxiety and depression but many other things too) and i feel like they can all kind of exacerbate one another.

Author: axonotem
Text: It’s a mental illness itself but it can be accompanied by other mental illnesses like anxiety for example
